title: (x) "Inglourious Basterds" Fonts - Egyptienne, Beton, (grungy version of) Ionia {Florian, Lex}
content:
This is really bothering me. Can anybody identify this font, please?

[Inglourious Basterds 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052922/http:/www.inglouriousbasterds.info/new/inglourious-basterds-wallpaper.jpg)  
 [Inglourious Basterds 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052922/http:/www.inglouriousbasterds.info/new/poster_inglourious_basterds_01.jpg)
author: Andrew Clark

comments.content:
Hi Andrew,

looks like this generically named [Egyptienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052922/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/egyptienne_bold_extended_ot_std/?&sample_text=INGLORIOUS%20BASTERDS&sample_size=24).  
The white subhead in the second picture is [Beton](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052922/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/beton_extra_bold_ot_std/?&sample_text=QUENTIN%20TARANTINO).  
‘2009' is yet another slab.  
F
Thank you so much. I've seen this font before. I couldn't remember it, though...it was driving me crazy!

[Ionia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052922/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?&q=ionia&sample_text=ONCE%20UPON%20A%20TIME) is close, although your sample looks like it has the grunge built in.

- Lex

I found it on dafont in the Stencil/Army section. I'm not sure of its legality (since it's so close to Ionia) so I won't mention its name though. You can find it easily enough.

- Lex

@ psykwon: The font in the trailer was just noted here.

[http://typophile.com/node/59358](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052922/http:/typophile.com/node/59358 "http://typophile.com/node/59358")
anyone know the hugo stiglitz font? please?

Jacquelin,  
welcome to Typophile.  
Do you have a sample?  
And please start a new thread for your request. Thank you!  
F

Florian Hardwig,  
yes i do, in my new post here [http://typophile.com/node/65991](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052922/http:/typophile.com/node/65991 "http://typophile.com/node/65991")
